detail_desc: Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down the sides and at the crotch.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a textured weave with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, and pockets in the side seams.
Long-sleeved shirt with an easy-iron finish, turn-down collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Tops in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Ankle-length jeans in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs with contrasting colour side stripes.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Slip-on trainers in imitation sheepskin with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing with an overlocked edge at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill trim around the neckline and at the cuffs, long raglan sleeves and a ribbed hem.
Espadrilles in a cotton weave with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, chest pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Press-studs at the sides, a fake fly and raw-edge hems with an inset lace trim.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and rounded hem.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while running. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch for increased ventilation. Legs with reflective details for increased visibility outdoors and a slit in one side of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.

Short-sleeved shirt in cotton seersucker with buttons down the front and a grandad collar with a contrasting colour inside. Small embroidered detail on the chest, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem.
V-neck, sleeveless top in a cotton weave with pin-tucks at the front and lace trims around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Tube top in ribbed cotton jersey with elastication around the top.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hems, and press-stud fastenings.
T-shirt in soft, ribbed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and overlocked edges.
Flared, calf-length skirt in tulle with a flock print. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Short-sleeved, circular top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Padded sleep bag in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pleated skirt woven in a sturdy viscose blend with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 2-10Y) and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Ribbed trim around the neckline.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with short sleeves, buttons down the front and a flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, small embroidered motif on the front and kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short jacket in soft pile with a double-layered hood, concealed press-studs down the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif at the top.
Trainer socks in a pattern-knit cotton blend.
Joggers in a soft, textured cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, leg pockets and elasticated hems.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Short-sleeved shirt with a bow tie and waistcoat in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar and buttons down the front and at the sleeve hems. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Waistcoat with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short dress in slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, frill-trimmed dolman sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a sewn-in skirt flap at the front that ties at one side. High waist and a zip at the back.
Short, straight T-shirt dress in viscose jersey.
Cotton poplin shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves. hole-knit sections and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in softly draping satin with a V-shaped opening at the front and ties at the neckline. Gathered seam at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Beret in soft, textured-knit cashmere.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in lace with chiffon appliqués, a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Gathered seam at the waist, zip at the back and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with worn details, visible buttons at the front and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a round neckline and contrasting colour fringes on the short sides.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted side seams and short raglan sleeves.
Hat in soft, fine-knit, marled cotton with a ribbed hem.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and bottoms in glossy satin. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Square scarf in a soft weave.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with hard-worn details, a high waist and zip fly and button.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in twill with a high, paper bag waist that has a sewn-in tie belt and elastication at the back. Side pockets and tapered legs.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Thin metal rings in various designs. Three decorated with small, sparkly glass beads.
Long metal earrings decorated with sparkly stones. Length 12 cm.
Tanga briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with a low, elasticated waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.

Bucket bag in imitation leather with round metal handles and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Concealed magnetic fastening and one inner compartment. Unlined. Size 11x16x21 cm.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a raw-edge, flounced trim at the top and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in sequined, airy mesh with embroidery. Small opening with ties at the neck and a frill at the top. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. Lined with a sewn-in jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fitted tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend. Low sweetheart neckline with an opening and decorative tie detail, and a seam under the bust.
Short-sleeved football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with print motifs front and back.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Sleeveless top in sturdier jersey with smocking at the top, wide, smocked, frilled shoulder straps and a flare to the hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.

Jacket in a washed cotton weave with a stand-up, zipped collar and concealed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs and a zip down the front, shoulder tabs with a press-stud, elbow patches and adjustable tabs with press-studs at the cuffs. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Concealed drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.
Jumper in a soft knit decorated with rhinestone studs. Dropped shoulders, long, wide balloon sleeves with close-fitting cuffs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted sports vest top in sturdy, ribbed fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
